name: Zuk
description: ZUK is a web design, online marketing, graphic design and corporate image studio located in Barcelona and Lleida. It is formed by a team of designers and programmers, internal and external, with extensive experience in the sector. In ZUK we cover all the needs of your project (Logo design, catalogs, web design, online marketing, hosting service). A small internal team but with a wide support of collaborators, freelances and partners allows us to offer a global service.
